original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: The Alaska summit between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin was a success, with both leaders showing respect and making progress towards a potential policy of normalization. The US demonstrated its sovereignty in deciding when and how to talk to Russia, while Russia demonstrated its ability to negotiate while conflicts continue. The specific details of the summit's outcomes are not yet public, but both leaders have expressed a desire for peace and a potential deal.</s>
